title: Monthly retail sales of beer , wine and liquor stores in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have lowered.
Month Aug had the maximum Sales in billion CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Sales in billion CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.
There is a gap of 175.0 between the highest and lowest Sales in billion CAD found for 2017 in Month Dec and May.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have lowered.
mid_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have lowered.
Month Aug had the maximum Sales in billion CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Sales in billion CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.
There is a gap of 175.0 between the highest and lowest Sales in billion CAD found for 2017 in Month Dec and May.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have lowered.
Month Aug had the maximum Sales in billion CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Sales in billion CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.
Among all the Months, 2017 had the highest Sales in billion CAD 194.0 in Month Dec and lowest value 19.0 in Month May.
Month Dec and May had the biggest gap of 175.0 between the highest and lowest Sales in billion CAD found for 2017.
Among all 5 groups, 2017 had the gap of 175.0 between the maximum and minimum Sales in billion CAD observed in Month Dec and May respectively.
2018 had the maximum Sales in billion CAD out of all 5 groups in Month Aug followed by 2018 in Aug, and the minimum Sales in billion CAD is found for 2019 in Dec.
Averaging all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Month Feb is the maximum Sales in billion CAD and Apr is the minimum Sales in billion CAD.
